name: Hamro Nepali Keyboard
description: Hamro Keyboard is a Nepali keyboard for all of us who love Nepali language. You can use this keyboard to write Nepali text in any app. No need to copy and paste.  With Hamro Nepali Keyboard, you can type Nepali directly to any app. We support three keyboard layouts, Unicode Transliteration, MPP based Romanized layout, and traditional layout.   We also added Emoji support, Stickers, Themes and Numeric Keypad with the latest update.   Now, Type in Nepali and help your friends to type in Nepali. Lets promote Nepali language by typing in Nepali.  ---          ?                   , , , , , , ,                  ,  ,  , ,  ,  , ,                                                                ,   ( ),                              ,                                    !
